identity.name: E1
identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Nordic Clarity.

headings.usage: Use for all section headers, card titles, and big numbers. Tight tracking.

body.usage: Use for labels, paragraphs, and data tables.

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600&family=Manrope:wght@500;700;800&display=swap');

rules: CRITICAL: The app uses a 'Hybrid Theme'. The page background is LIGHT (#F8FAFC).
CRITICAL: Main data cards (Budget, Balance, Savings) must be DARK (#1E293B) with white text to match the reference.
Secondary cards (Recent transactions list) can be white/light.
Income numbers must always be Green (#10B981).
Expense/Alert numbers must always be Orange/Amber (#F59E0B).

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. gap-6 for grids.
layout.responsive: Mobile-first. Stack columns on mobile, expand to 3-4 columns on desktop.

buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-full px-8

cards.data_widget: bg-slate-900 text-white rounded-2xl p-6 shadow-xl border border-slate-800
cards.standard: bg-white text-slate-900 rounded-2xl p-6 shadow-sm border border-slate-100

inputs.style: bg-white border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-slate-900 rounded-lg h-12

images.instructions: Use 'hero_bg' for the landing page hero section background (with overlay). Use 'user_happy' for the testimonials or 'Join us' section.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. FILE EXTENSIONS: You are working with a React JS project. Use .js and .jsx extensions. DO NOT use .ts or .tsx.
2. SHADCN: The components are already installed in /src/components/ui. Use them.
3. ROUTING: Use 'react-router-dom' for navigation. Create a layout wrapper for the dashboard.
4. MOCK DATA: Since there is no backend connected yet, create a 'mockData.js' file to populate the dashboard with realistic Finnish data.
5. AUTH: Mock the JWT auth flow. Store a fake token in localStorage.
6. STRIPE: Mock the Stripe payment flow. Just show a success message after 'payment'.
7. LANGUAGE: All UI text MUST be in Finnish.
8. THEME: Implement the 'Hybrid Theme' (Light Page + Dark Widgets) manually using Tailwind classes. Do not rely on the system dark mode toggle for this specific look.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic gradients or centered text everywhere.
Micro-interactions: Add hover states to all cards (scale-105 or lift).
Data-Test-ID: Add data-testid attributes to all interactive elements.
Accessibility: Ensure high contrast between text and card backgrounds.
